statements:
DELETE FROM employee_payroll WHERE employee_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 70000 AND hire_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM payroll WHERE employee_id = 2 AND pay_date = '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM employee WHERE employee_id = 100 AND full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Travel' AND expense_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM Payroll WHERE payroll_date < '2022-01-01' AND net_pay < 5000
